New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi took four wickets for 22 runs
Key Match Events: Najmul Hossain Shanto scored 54 off 48 balls
Pakistan openers Babar and Mohammad Rizwan put on 57 in 10.3 overs
Mohammad Haris injected some urgency into proceedings with 31 off 18
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan kept themselves in the hunt by beating the Netherlands and South Africa
A straight shootout between Pakistan and Bangladesh due to South Africa's shock loss to the Netherlands
Post-Match Reflections: India’s victory over Zimbabwe dropped Pakistan back down to second in the group standings
Pakistan will take on New Zealand in their semi-final on Wednesday at Sydney
Miscellaneous Highlights: The on-field lbw verdict against Shakib Al Hasan was upheld by the third umpire as technology was inconclusive about whether the Bangladesh captain had got bat to ball
Others: Pakistan benefited from South Africa’s shock loss to the Netherlands to claim a place in the T20 World Cup semi-finals
